nodes.excerpt: Kintell is a platform that connects people looking for advice with those qualified to give it, via paid and Pro Bono video consultations. Browse for an Advisor, book in a session, and speak to them via the Kintell video platform.
nodes.title: Kintell - 1-to-1 video advice and tuition from vetted professionals

localize.description: Kintell是一个平台，通过付费和公益视频咨询，将寻求建议的人与有资格提供建议的人联系起来。通过Kintell视频平台，浏览顾问，预订会话，并与他们交谈。
localize.tagline: 经过审核的专业人员提供1对1的视频建议和指导。

nodes.excerpt: Tuti.study is a webapp that helps teachers and students to improve the way they learn online. You can create beautiful annonated presentations, create, save, share your online flashcards with students, friends and colleagues by sharing a link.

nodes.excerpt: Jooseph is a content curation tool for course creators to share learning paths with their audience. - Create interactive learning paths from any link on the web - Accept paid subscriptions, and make money - Make announcements, keep your audience updated

localize.tagline: 付费学习路径的内容策划工具

nodes.excerpt: Each week, we find you the single best article to read next for getting better at your job. In our mobile app, you're grouped with people in your role at different companies who are reading the same thing. Features facilitate intimate peer-to-peer learning.

nodes.author: Erik Spangenberg

localize.description: 每周，我们都会为你找到下一篇最好读的文章，让你在工作中获得更好的发展。在我们的移动应用中，你会与不同公司中与你的角色相同的人进行分组，他们都在阅读同样的东西。功能方便点对点的亲密学习。
localize.tagline: 个性化的短板学习，让你在技术上更上一层楼

localize.description: 每週，我們都會爲你找到下一篇最好讀的文章，讓你在工作中獲得更好的發展。在我們的移動應用中，你會與不同公司中與你的角色相同的人進行分組，他們都在閱讀同樣的東西。功能方便點對點的親密學習。

nodes.excerpt: We have created a motivating way for people to mix exercise and fun. It is a library of augmented reality games: Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, and Brick Breaker AR. Do pushups to play the games. Go play at playar.ai and earn your spot on the leaderboard!

localize.tagline: 增强现实游戏让你动起来

nodes.excerpt: Litmaps lets you navigate the scientific literature with interactive visualisations of citation networks. Create a literature map, discover new articles, and export your discoveries, to advance your research project.

localize.description: Litmaps让你通过交互式可视化的引用网络来浏览科学文献。创建一个文献地图，发现新的文章，并导出你的发现，以推进你的研究项目。

nodes.excerpt: TeenUP was created to give kids a platform to learn new skills each day from their peers. The app allows kids to quickly and easily create short, unique, educational videos to share with friends and the world.
nodes.title: TeenUp - A learning platform designed for teens by teens
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: TeenUP的创立是为了给孩子们提供一个平台，让他们每天都能从同伴那里学到新的技能。该应用允许孩子们快速、轻松地创建短小、独特、有教育意义的视频，与朋友和世界分享。
localize.tagline: 由青少年设计的青少年学习平台

localize.description: TeenUP的創立是爲了給孩子們提供一個平臺，讓他們每天都能從同伴那裏學到新的技能。該應用允許孩子們快速、輕鬆地創建短小、獨特、有教育意義的視頻，與朋友和世界分享。
localize.tagline: 由青少年設計的青少年學習平臺

nodes.excerpt: A web app that uses spaced repetition, a sophisticated learning algorithm, and a tree-structured note-taking tool. Think Workflowy and Anki combined. It also brings together various learning theories and tricks.
nodes.title: LearnObit - A cognitive tool to boost learning
nodes.author: Sungho Yahng

localize.description: 一款使用间隔重复、复杂的学习算法和树状结构的记事工具的网络应用。想想Workflowy和Anki的结合。它还汇集了各种学习理论和技巧。
localize.tagline: 促进学习的认知工具

localize.description: 一款使用間隔重複、複雜的學習算法和樹狀結構的記事工具的網絡應用。想想Workflowy和Anki的結合。它還彙集了各種學習理論和技巧。
localize.tagline: 促進學習的認知工具

nodes.excerpt: Amaze your friends with GIFs of historical figures that are ready to use on Giphy.com. At yadada.app, we used a great AI tool from Rosebud AI to map 15 emotions to 30 historical figures like Shakespeare, Tesla, Franklin (full list in the comments).
nodes.title: Historical Animated GIFs - Over 500 animated GIFs of talking historical figures
nodes.author: Jan A. Kolar

localize.description: 用Giphy.com上准备好的历史人物的GIF来惊艳你的朋友。在yadada.app，我们使用了Rosebud AI的一个伟大的AI工具，将15种情绪映射到30个历史人物身上，如莎士比亚、特斯拉、富兰克林（完整列表在评论中）。
localize.tagline: 超过500个会说话的历史人物的GIF动画。

localize.description: 用Giphy.com上準備好的歷史人物的GIF來驚豔你的朋友。在yadada.app，我們使用了Rosebud AI的一個偉大的AI工具，將15種情緒映射到30個歷史人物身上，如莎士比亞、特斯拉、富蘭克林（完整列表在評論中）。
localize.tagline: 超過500個會說話的歷史人物的GIF動畫。

nodes.excerpt: Repl.it Teams for Education is a real-time collaborative coding environment for teachers and students to write code in 50+ languages. Teachers can create curriculum, facilitate pair-coding groups, provide instant code feedback with annotations and autograding.
nodes.title: Repl.it Teams for Education - Zero-setup collaborative cloud IDE for teachers and students
nodes.author: Derrick McMillen

localize.description: Repl.it Teams for Education是一个实时协作的编码环境，教师和学生可以用50多种语言编写代码。教师可以创建课程，促进配对编码组，提供即时代码反馈与注释和签名。
localize.tagline: 为教师和学生提供零设置的协作式云IDE

localize.description: Repl.it Teams for Education是一個實時協作的編碼環境，教師和學生可以用50多種語言編寫代碼。教師可以創建課程，促進配對編碼組，提供即時代碼反饋與註釋和簽名。
localize.tagline: 爲教師和學生提供零設置的協作式雲IDE

nodes.excerpt: We're the #1 weekend co-working club for bootstrappers to stay motivated, get helpful feedback and ship your project faster. Live sessions Saturdays 10am-5pm GMT & US Central time with a dedicated host, run over Slack & Zoom. Plus 100+ software discounts. 🤯
nodes.title: Weekend Club - The weekend co-working club for bootstrappers to ship faster
nodes.author: Charlie Ward

localize.description: 我们是引导者的第一周末联合办公俱乐部，让你保持积极性，得到有用的反馈，更快地完成项目。每周六格林威治标准时间和美国中部时间上午10点到下午5点，由专门的主持人通过Slack和Zoom进行实时会话。加上100+软件折扣。🤯
localize.tagline: 周末联合办公俱乐部，让引导者更快地出货。

localize.description: 我們是引導者的第一週末聯合辦公俱樂部，讓你保持積極性，得到有用的反饋，更快地完成項目。每週六格林威治標準時間和美國中部時間上午10點到下午5點，由專門的主持人通過Slack和Zoom進行實時會話。加上100+軟件折扣。🤯
localize.tagline: 週末聯合辦公俱樂部，讓引導者更快地出貨。

nodes.excerpt: 🔎 Discover new ideas from 1500+ books, courses, and documentaries ⠀ 💡Get smart fast with our 5-min Hacks to keep you informed and save your time ⠀ 🧠 Designed to make learning fun and memorable
nodes.title: Uptime - The best books, courses & documentaries in 5 minutes or less
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 🔎从1500多本书籍、课程和纪录片中发现新的想法 ⠀ 💡通过我们的5分钟小技巧快速获得智能，让你了解情况并节省时间 ⠀ 🧠旨在让学习变得有趣和难忘。
localize.tagline: 5分钟内最好的书籍、课程和纪录片

localize.description: 🔎從1500多本書籍、課程和紀錄片中發現新的想法 ⠀ 💡通過我們的5分鐘小技巧快速獲得智能，讓你瞭解情況並節省時間 ⠀ 🧠旨在讓學習變得有趣和難忘。
localize.tagline: 5分鐘內最好的書籍、課程和紀錄片
